sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS time, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'White_British' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE area_name BETWEEN '2011' AND '2021' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT '2021 Census' AS time, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Asian_Indian' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;

SELECT LSOA_code AS x_bin, 'Black_African' AS y_bin, SUM(population_count) AS count FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Black African' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY LSOA_code ORDER BY LSOA_code;

SELECT date AS time, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'White_British' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2011-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date; UNION ALL SELECT date AS time, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Asian_Indian' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2011-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date;
SELECT '2021' AS time, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Black African' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;

SELECT 'Year ' || EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS time, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Asian_Indian' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2011 AND 2021 GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date);
